column1: Chalisgaon pronunciation  is a town and a municipal council located in Jalgaon district in the state of Maharashtra
The city is connected with major cities of Maharashtra such as Dhule by railway and road
column4: Pune by railway. Dhule and Aurangabad are the nearest airports.

column1: Chalisgaon is located at 20.47°N 75.02°E﻿ / 20.47; 75.02. It has an average elevation of 344 metres (1128 feet).
Hari Vinayak Pataskar (Politician and Law Minister and later on Public Aviation Minister from 1955-57).
Daji Nana Bhandari (Fighter in Annexation of Goa).
